text: 7.52: 2 Sto 36.16; Mt 21.35; 23.31; 1 Te 2.15Nden nzɨgi, fhum maaŋgi Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma, mbe tɨva mbatɨga thuen ana muuŋgi fhu? Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe fhum khaŋ nzuai gumgi, mbe mbe shogim, mbe vhɨzav ki. Mbe khaŋ nzuai, ‘Tɨvar vhuuaŋ mbui guma ana zɨrga.’ Mbe maaŋ nzuav kim, mba guma ntige zɨgim, nde ana ndim ana pana gumgir farve khɨngim, mbe ana shogim, ana rimgi.
